remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数创建语义解释标记其属性包含空字符串。This constructor creates a semantic interpretation tag whose property contains an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数创建语义解释标记其属性设置中的值为`script`。This constructor creates a semantic interpretation tag whose property is set to the value in `script`.
